attributes.action: New £100 note to fund UK Tech Startups!
attributes.additional_details:
Let's use an exciting new bank note to make Britain even more creative!

British Startups need support. We hereby propose a new currency denomination be issued, on limited edition. The £100.00 note, with the father of the web on its face.

We petition that a percentage of each fee for "first edition" purchases builds a new non-government administered startup fund. Run by a jury service-style Enterprise council - to be chaired by independent business leaders and regulated by the Dept. of Business, Innovation and Skills.

The "Tim Berners-Lee" note would be a creative competition, an inspiring opportunity and the fund council represent a vocational bridge for seasoned entrepreneurs and younger, eager business people.

Sign up and support now!
